author: Joohee Cho, Hakyung Kate Lee
title: South Korea's COVID-19 test makers in high demand
description: Seoul has set up a task force to keep up with the surge in requests.
content:
SEOUL, South Korea -- 
South Korea has received requests from 121 countries to export or donate coronavirus testing supplies, according to one government official.
To meet the sudden surge of demands from foreign countries, Seoul has set up a task force wit… [+5180 chars]
